EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Survival is not Mandatory Josh Long_Seattle_Q417.2017 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Survival is not Mandatory: Cloud-Native Java | Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Survival is not Mandatory: Cloud-Native Java event at the Nascar Hall of Fame in their Legends Room on August 7, 2017.
Please feel free to leave your laptop at home and enjoy the live coding with Pivotal's Josh Long. Happy hour and networking will also continue at the Nascar Hall of Fame directly after the event; we hope you can make it.
Date: Monday, August 7, 2017
Time:
12:45PM to 6:00PM
Location: Nascar Hall of Fame | Legends Room 400 E M.L.K. Jr Blvd Charlotte, NC, 28202 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/NASCAR+Hall+of+Fame/@35.2212875,-80.8434273,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0xae5de43691fbcde9?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwiGrNGbjPjUAhVYwGMKHVYhCUwQ_BIIkQEwEg]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Survival-is-not-Mandatory-Charlotte.html]]>
